adHeader: Model/dancer Looking for photographer and also videographer as well
adDetails: I am looking for a professional photographer to help me take pictures. I am a young attractive samba dancer, and need another photo to go on my website, is anyone looking for models to take pictures of or do videos of. I can model for you. I have a lot of gorgeous samba costumes coming in the mail to model in and dance in, plus I'm a samba dancer, so if you're interested in video producing a top notch dancer, so if you're a video producer or filmmaker who likes to capture a raw essence of dancer's talent, especially with a young woman doing such an exotic rare raw style of core samba dancing in the bay that many in the bay cannot master to the brazlian indigenous!!!that's where I come in!!! to step it off and showcase my natural ability and skill that i do with so much fluidity and God-given-born ease!!!, I would and could use an extra video to go and place on my website that is about to jump off!!! with the help of the two of us!!! Thankyou so much for your time and getting back to me. I won't waste your time or mine. Definately won't since we're both getting a lot out of it. Much Thanks.
